data.title: NEPTUNE'S BOAT
data.teaser:
NEPTUNES BOAT“ By Emmanuel Eni
(A Sail boat made from 6000 Plastic water bottles)

„Neptunes Boat“ is an Allusion to the power of nature element water,
symbolized by Neptune, who in the Western mythology is the ocean god
The personificaion of the ocean its -self 

Description:

„Neptunes Boat“ is a sculpted sail boat with a cannon. made from 6000 empty recycled palstic water bottles.  Size: 9mtr Long, 5mtr wide with it’s 5mtr. High sail

Intention of the making of  „Neptunes boat“
To be exhibited and sailed on the nearest river in Stuttgart in Summer 2010

Motive of Making and Sailing „Neptunes Boat“:
To draw attention and to address nature, scarcity and endangerment of water.
To realize a mordern and contemporary art work from recycled material.
To realize an interdisciplinary presentation that cyrstalizes many genries of Art and that connects many attributes ofinteraction
To explore the expotation of werstern values through through politics of globalization
To sail and exhibit –neptunes boat- in Stutgart and other cities with rivers

Lenght of Exhibition "Neptunes Boat":
1 month: (before sail) to create platform for the boats popularity to maximize participation on the –sailing day

I hereby apply for 3000 euros for Karin Abt- Straubinger Stifftung 2011 to be able to realize the production and presentation this Art work/ project.

More of my works are at www.emmanueleni-waterfornature-preservation.de 
www.emmanuel-eni-galerie.de
www.emmanuel-eni.de
data.city: Berlin, and in All cities towns and villages with river
answers:
„Neptunes Boat“ is an Allusion to the power of nature element water,
symbolized by Neptune, who in the Western mythology is the ocean god
The personificaion of the ocean its -self 

„Neptunes Boat“ is an Allusion to the power of nature element water,
symbolized by Neptune, who in the Western mythology is the ocean god
The personificaion of the ocean its -self 

Intention of the making of  „Neptunes boat“
To be exhibited and sailed on the nearest river in Berlin in Summer 2011

To draw attention and to address nature, scarcity and endangerment of water.
To realize a mordern and contemporary art work from recycled material.
To realize an interdisciplinary presentation that cyrstalizes many genries of Art and that connects many attributes of interaction
To explore the expotation of werstern values through through politics of globalization
To sail and exhibit –neptunes boat- in Berlin and other cities with rivers

The money is for the finishing of the boat. Which has a professionell sail sponsored already by a company in Berlin. Including already sponsored 6000 empty bottles of water by a mineral water company in Germany. Part of the money will be used to bring the boat to the first city river for a sail, where the entire public is invited.

Der Künstler Emmanuel Eni geboren in Nigeria hat mit seinen Projekten
Installation-/Performance-Art: u.a.
Blackman in European Kitchen,  Charakter LAGOStika, Death of the
curator, Africanize, Israel and Palestine,
Publikationen: u.a. Death of the curator,  "Masqueradeundressing" Gründer
und Frontmann der Blue-Funk-BandAusstellungen ENIMATIC, CDs Enimatic-enimatic
(2008) und Enimatic-enimal (2009).
Ausstellung und Performance in America, Europa, Afrika, Asien und
Lehrtätigkeit an der Rhode Island School of Design (RISD), New-Hampshire USA;
Centre Monroe for the Arts, New Jersey, USA; Goethe Institut Lagos Nigeria,
Dakar Senegal; Universität Bayreuth Deutschland, Kunsthochschule
Berlin-Weisensee. Er hat Teilgenommen in Dakar, Lyon, bienalle U.A und
präsentierte death of the curator zu Documenta 12, in 2007 in Kassel.2010 Hatte er ­die schönste Wasser flache der Welt- Kreate in Emmanuel Eni
Water for Nature preservation  Art, Music, fashion charity for Africa.
Emmanuel Eni ist Poet und Multimediakünstler und Erfinder des
zeitgenössischen Barocks, einer Kunstform der Vereinigung/Kristallisation und
Veränderung aller Aspekte von Kunst. Sein künstlerisches Wirken umfasst neben
klassischer Bildender Kunst (Malerei/Skulptur), Installations- und
Performance-Art, Poesie und Musik und ist so facettenreich wie er selbst. In
der internationalen Kunstszene ist er seit Jahren ein bekannter und viel
diskutierter Künstler.  Emmanuel Eni lebt und arbeitet seit 1993 in Berlin.
